name: Yingxue Zhang 0002
content: Yingxue Zhang - Our Faculty | School of Computing | Binghamton University Skip to main content School of Computing Our Faculty Yingxue Zhang Assistant Professor School of Computing yzhang42@binghamton.edu EB N04 BackgroundZhang is an assistant professor in the School of Computing at Binghamton University. She got her PhD in data science from Worcester Polytechnic Institute in 2022. Her broad research interests include: Designing novel data mining, machine learning and AI techniques to solve spatial-temporal big data analytics problems related to smart cities and public safetyHuman behavior analysis and decision-making Website Publications Yingxue Zhang, Yanhua Li, Xun Zhou, Zhenming Liu, Jun Luo (2021).
